comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This is not a Gotha G.III. It is the Zeppelin-Staaken R.XIV, one of the Riesenflugzeuge (Giant aircraft) built by Zeppelin's Staaken facility outside of Berlin or by one of the license-builders (Aviatik, etc.) It is shown after being stripped by Allied souvenir hunters after the Armistice allowed them onto abandoned airfields in former German territory. This aircraft was larger than a B-17 and had 5 260+ horsepower engines.
